data.eml:eml: The genus Leucodellus Reuter, 1906 in China (Hemiptera: Miridae: Phylinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Xiao-Ming, Liu, Guo-Qing (2007): The genus Leucodellus Reuter, 1906 in China (Hemiptera: Miridae: Phylinae). Zootaxa 1478: 33-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176797
